_description: Advice not to trust the World — three couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines: Worldis blisse strif hat wroutfor it is wit serwe to ende brout…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …trist nout to þis wonder world þat lastit bot a wilefor it is not bot wiles of wo a hasardour þat wil þe gile
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose inserted into Latin, the couplets separated by Latin prose.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
